address: Me Tri Ha Street, Nam Tuliem District, Ha Noicity
fulltext:
C&B SPECIALIST
EXPERIENCE
•
Participate in proposals, construction processes, regulations, remuneration;
•
Implement tracking, calculation, and implementation procedures for paying 
salaries, bonuses, and remuneration for all employees;
•
Management and implementation of social insurance and other benefits for 
employees;
•
Transactions on PIT: Register PIT code, tax settlement year, …;
•
Laborrelations: laborcontract, leave, change the status HR, change of salary 
and bonus regime, rank, appointment, dismissal, transfer, reward, 
discipline,...;
•
Participate in planning and managing information on staffing and budgeting;
•
Human resources reports: analysis of the Company's personnel costs, 
employee income, cost components, income components, etc., thereby 
making assessments and recommendations suitable to the business situation.
LE, CAO THI
August 1, 1992 
0974 049 792

District, Ha NoiCity.
